person.persName: David T. Scott (Henry County, Kentucky, tailor.)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, tailor. Ohio native. Married to Rebecca Scott. Father of Benjamin Scott and Elizabeth Scott. Tailor in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Employed John Johnson as an apprentice in Henry County in 1850. Employed William Dennis, Charles Gibson, and James Dennis as tailors in Henry County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in 1850. Tailor in Henry County in 1860. Employed Susan Kent as a dressmaker in Henry County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Henry County in 1860.
